title: Are there any must sticky discussions that you guys want added?
body:
Ask for it here. The discussion needs to be valuable to anyone who visits GD, so please only suggest threads like that. This may or may not result in a sticky of a thread. If enough people ask for it in here (via voting and comments) then we will, but otherwise we won't.

**Edit**: Please add links guys. I can't be 100% sure which discussion you are talking about without one.
